-1.title: War's a Coming...

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Belle follows the sharp-witted heroine of the same moniker, and her travels around the world. First seen in 13 Chambers, Belle was one of the original 13 Marshals under Abraham Lincoln's employment to assist the nation for whatever was needed at a moment's notice. After Lincoln's assassination, the marshals were sent into hiding, resulting in a whirlwind global adventure for Belle and her 13- Chambered pistol.
imdb.title: The Adventures of Belle
